entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 14 in a few localities. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 7 except minus 14 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:10 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
